title: Divinity : Original Sin 2 v3.0.180.158
description:
Release date: 2017
Genre: RPG, Strategy, TBS, Isometric, 3D
Developer: Larian Studios
Publisher: Larian Studios
Publication Type: RePack
Language: RUS | ENG | MULTI4
Language of voice: ENG
Crack : Not Required (DRM Free)

Divinity: Original Sin 2 is a party RPG, developed by the Belgian studio Larian Studios for PCs and is a continuation of Divinity: Original Sin. Events Divinity: Original Sin 2 occur a thousand years after the events experienced in Divinity: Original Sin. In a world where the Gods are dead, you are a master of forbidden magic imprisoned in Fort Joy Island prison. The masters of the Divine Order want to "heal" you of your abilities. However, the Order itself also has secrets - secrets that threaten everyone. In a world where there are no gods, chaos sets in, and to avoid this, he needs a new Deity. Choose the race and background of your character and see how the world will react to your choice. Collect the team and get rid of enemies in tactical turn-based battles. Explore the extensive and multi-level world of Rivellon alone or in a company of four in the cooperative mode of passage.

For full list of changes see the patchnotes file

How to install : 

Mount the iso
Install 
Play
